--- title: "Oregon FQHC Landscape" subtitle: "Automated analysis of Health Center Service Delivery Sites" author: "E. Pitzer" date: last-modified categories: [Data Engineering, Healthcare, Python] format: html: code-fold: true toc: true jupyter: python3 --- ## Project Status **Phase 1: Data Pipeline Active** Data is sourced directly from the [HRSA Data Warehouse](https://data.hrsa.gov/). ### At a Glance We are currently tracking **329** service delivery sites across **83** cities in Oregon. ### Sites by County (Top 10) Where are the health center sites concentrated? ::: {#cell-fig-county-dist .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Configure the visual style sns.set_theme(style="whitegrid") plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6)) # Count sites per county - USING CORRECTED COLUMN NAME county_counts = df['County Equivalent Name'].value_counts().head(10).reset_index() county_counts.columns = ['County', 'Sites'] # Plot ax = sns.barplot(data=county_counts, x='Sites', y='County', palette="viridis", hue='County') ax.set_title("Top 10 Counties by Number of Sites") plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![Distribution of FQHC Sites by County](index_files/figure-html/fig-county-dist-output-1.png){#fig-county-dist width=873 height=529} ::: ::: ### Data Preview Below is a sample of the raw data feeding this report. ::: {#tbl-preview .cell tbl-cap='Recent Site Data Entry' execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Display a clean table of just a few relevant columns # USING CORRECTED COLUMN NAME display_cols = ['Site Name', 'Site City', 'County Equivalent Name', 'Health Center Type'] df[display_cols].sample(5) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ```{=html}
Site Name Site City County Equivalent Name Health Center Type
191 Prospect Charter School Prospect Jackson Federally Qualified Health Center (FQHC)
270 Community Health Center of Clatskanie Clatskanie Columbia Federally Qualified Health Center (FQHC)
281 NARA Residential Treatment Center Portland Multnomah Federally Qualified Health Center (FQHC)
323 Springfield Schools Health Center Springfield Lane Federally Qualified Health Center (FQHC)
60 Wallace Student Health Center Gresham Multnomah Federally Qualified Health Center (FQHC)
``` ::: :::
